articles.title: Chrome and Edge Want to Help Solve Your Password Problems - WIRED

articles.content: If youre like lots of people, someone has probably nagged you to use a password manager and you still havent heeded the advice. Now, Chrome and Edge are coming to the rescue with beefed-up password m… [+4006 chars]
